events.message: I received my order yesterday but want to return it as it does not fit the description and I would like a refund.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for returning the item and receiving their money back.
Assigning this case to the refunds team for further handling of the return and reimbursement process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return your order and receive a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and specify the reason for your return so we can process it quickly?
The order number is 987654321. The product was much smaller than described on your website, so it doesn’t meet my expectations.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate the return process immediately and issue a full refund once we receive the item. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the help and look forward to the return label.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email address. Once you ship the product back, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you were able to send the return shipment and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I sent the return parcel two days ago. Thank you for your help and clear instructions throughout the process.
We have received your returned item and the refund has been successfully processed to your original payment method.
We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey about your refund experience.
I completed the survey and am satisfied with how the return and refund were handled, especially the prompt support.
Closing this case now as the refund issue has been resolved to the customer's satisfaction and no further action is required.
